# OpenText Partner Directory Scraper

This C# console application is designed to scrape the OpenText partner directory website to extract the list of 567 partners.

## Project Guidelines for Copilot

- This is a C# console application for web scraping
- Focus on web scraping techniques using HtmlAgilityPack and HttpClient
- Handle dynamic content loading (JavaScript) if needed using Selenium
- Extract partner names, companies, and other relevant information
- Output results in a structured format (JSON/CSV)
- Include proper error handling and logging
- Follow C# best practices and async/await patterns
- Use dependency injection where appropriate
